com.simsilica.lemur.geom

Class DMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Mesh
      • com.simsilica.lemur.geom.DMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DMesh
extends com.jme3.scene.Mesh
    A mesh that wraps another mesh to provide a deformed view using a Deformation function.
